metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11558 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libgpac.a in GPAC 0.8.0, as demonstrated by MP4Box. audio_sample_entry_Read in isomedia/box_code_base.c does not properly decide when to make gf_isom_box_del calls. This leads to various use-after-free outcomes involving mdia_Read, gf_isom_delete_movie, and gf_isom_parse_movie_boxes.

criterions.comment: ccextractor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
gpac package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
